title: WILD NFT
description: NFTs supporting natural environments are underdeveloped. Huge opportunity exists for NFTs that help protect natural environments & animals.
solution: WILD NFT is a world class NFT minting & market platform that delivers wellbeing and sustainability for natural environments and animals.
experience: We founded dignifid.org, a nonprofit providing digital ID to support wellbeing for animals & environment. NFT Maker Pro is our tech partner.
